summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Global Horizon University Alumni Network. All major features are functional including registration, login, dashboard, events, connect, donate, about, contact, and profile pages. Backend APIs are fully operational. Frontend UI is responsive and working correctly across desktop, tablet, and mobile viewports.

cors_issues.issue: CORS policy blocking requests from frontend domain
cors_issues.impact: Alumni list not loading on Connect page

cors_issues.issue: CORS policy blocking profile update requests

integration_issues.issue: Alumni list not loading due to CORS issues

accessibility_warnings.issue: Missing DialogTitle and Description for screen reader accessibility

passed_tests: Homepage loading with hero banner and navigation buttons
User registration with form validation and phone formatting (XXX) XXX-XXXX
Dashboard with greeting, batch year, and stats cards (Total Alumni, Upcoming Events, Recent Donations)
Events page displaying 10 events with 4 having registration buttons (evt1, evt2, evt4, evt5)
Event registration modal with pre-filled user data and dinner attendance option
Donate page with 3 causes and donation form with amount validation ($10-$10000)
Payment modal with Card/UPI options and success message
About page with 1000+ words content and clickable image gallery (8 campus images)
Contact page with feedback form and 200 character limit enforcement
Profile page with editable fields and save functionality
Sidebar navigation working for all menu items
Responsive design working on desktop (1920x1080), tablet (768x1024), and mobile (390x844) viewports
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix CORS configuration in backend to allow requests from frontend domain. The backend APIs are working correctly but CORS policy is blocking some frontend requests. Add proper CORS headers or update CORS_ORIGINS environment variable to include the frontend domain.

success_percentage.frontend: 95% - All major features working, minor CORS issues affecting some API calls
